ygData.subject: Re: Wis Increasing Items (spoiler)
ygData.msgSnippet: i believe sol a, but don t quote me on that one....i was given both of mine
ygData.messageBody:
i believe sol a, but don't quote me on that one....i was given both of mine <my
cleric's and my druid's as handmedowns, thus i'm not sure>

Ryan Robinson wrote:

> From: "Ryan Robinson" <bigsexxyryan@...>
>
> Hail my friends i was wondering if anyone could tell me where i could get
> those +3 wis plate arms bands?
>
> Enursin High Cleric of the Black Tower
>
> >From: "Perhaps a Princess..." <sarah@...>
> >Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> >To: "'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com'" <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
> >Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] Wis Increasing Items (spoiler)
> >Date: Wed, 25 Aug 1999 09:25:52 -0700 (PDT)
> >
> >From: "Perhaps a Princess..." <sarah@...>
> >
> >Interesting. Silver Jasper Rings are now +2 wisdom. And definitely rings.
> >My jeweler made them last night.
> >
> >Meara, Level 8 Enchanter, Phoenix, Solusek Ro
> >
> >On Wed, 25 Aug 1999, Ralph Carothers wrote:
> >
> > > btw- silver jasper earrings were +2 wis
> > >
> > > -----Original Message-----
> > > From: Ralph Carothers [mailto:CarothersR@...]
> > > Sent: Wednesday, August 25, 1999 12:18 PM
> > > To: 'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com'
> > > Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] Wis Increasing Items (spoiler)
> > >
> > >
> > >
> > > i've had silver jasper earrings though....so your point here would be
> >moot I
> > > would say. I've had silver EVERYTHING
> > >
> > > -----Original Message-----
> > > From: Deane, Ben [ mailto:BDeane@... <mailto:BDeane@...> ]
> > > Sent: Wednesday, August 25, 1999 12:21 PM
> > > To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> > > Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] Wis Increasing Items (spoiler)
> > >
> > >
> > > From: "Deane, Ben" <BDeane@...>
> > >
> > > Platinum-jasper makes a ring, not an earring. (According to the
> >jewellery
> > > tables).
> > > In general, silver and platinum make items for the same body part, and
> > > likewise gold and electrum.
> > > So the best ear items are +3 wis gold-jasper earrings. Aside from
> >Invandyr's
> > >
> > > hoop that is.
> > >
> > > Elbeno
> > >
> > > > -----Original Message-----
> > > > From: Rose [ mailto:rliu@... <mailto:rliu@...> ]
> > > > Sent: 25 August 1999 16:58
> > > > To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> > > > Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] Wis Increasing Items (spoiler)
> > > >
> > > >
> > > > From: "Rose" <rliu@...>
> > > >
> > > > O you are making me drool! BTW I thought there is a plat
> > > > jasper earring
> > > > that gives +6 WIS each...am I wrong here? I noticed it was
> > > > not listed here.
> > > >
> > > > Just where do you get that mammoth cloak anyway and how hard is it?
> > > >
> > > > -Imogen ;P
> > > >
> > > >
> > > > >
> > > > > Someone posted the following list of the 'best' wisdom/mana
> > > > > increasing items for a cleric (by inventory slot) on the
> > > > internet. I
> > > > > forwarded it to my guild and titled it my wish list ;)
> > > > >
> > > > > Sorry I dont have the persons name to give full credit to.
> > > > I've tried
> > > > > to notate where things come from.
> > > > >
> > > > > ******
> > > > >
> > > > > Ear Gold Jasper Earrings =3 wis *2 (from a jeweler)
> > > > >
> > > > > Face Plat Ruby Veil =7wis 7str (jeweler)
> > > > >
> > > > > Neck Chrysoberyl Talisman =3wis 20mana 
> > > > >
> > > > > Head Nightshade Wreath =Ac 1 5wis 5int 
> > > > >
> > > > > Fingers Plat Jasper Ring =6wis*2 (jeweler)
> > > > >
> > > > > Wrists Runed Mithril Bracers =(4ac 3str 5wis)*2 
> > > > >
> > > > > Shoulders Adamanite Epolets =12ac 7wis 
> > > > >
> > > > > Arms Plat Arm Band =3str 3wis 
> > > > >
> > > > > Chest BS Tunic=12ac 4agi 4wis (Undead Knight in Unrest,
> > > > > group of at least low 20s needed)
> > > > >
> > > > > Hands Dark Mail Gaunthlets =10ac 5dex 50mana 
> > > > >
> > > > > Back Mammouth Cloak =5AC 4wis 5vs. Cold 
> > > > >
> > > > > Waist Bone Clasped Gridle =4ac 7str 7sta 7dex 75 hp
> > > > > 75mana (one of the few items from the Plane of Fear
> > > > > that is NOT no drop)
> > > > >
> > > > > Legs Gatorscale Leggings =7ac 4wis 15hp (Cazic Thule?,
> > > > > group in mid to high 20s required minimum)
> > > > >
> > > > > Feet Golden Efreeti Boots =5ac 9wis 9int 
> > > > >
> > > > > Weapon Paw of Opello =9ac 5sta 9dex 9wis -5chr 5mana -
> > > > > 5sv.Disease (Quest item)
> > > > > 
> > > > > Shield Charred Gaurdian =10ac 9wis (off clockwork in
> > > > > Solusek dungeon, group of high 20's to low 30s at least
> > > > > required)
> > > > >
> > > > > Alternate weapon when actually getting into melee: 
> > > > > Gem Encrusted Scepter =5wis (from Princess in
> > > > > Mistmoore, group of 30+ required)
> > > > > 
> > > > > Ending Stats increases 
> > > > > AC 84 
> > > > > STR 23 
> > > > > STA 12 
> > > > > AGI 13 
> > > > > DEX 12 
> > > > > WIS 92 !!! 
> > > > > Int 14 
> > > > > CHAR -5 
> > > > > HP 90 
> > > > > Mana 150
> > > > >
> > > > > *****
> > > > >
> > > > > Not too shabby, huh?
> > > > >
> > > > > --Aaldiana D'Ozz
